DOC.criteria: Confirmed allergy ( allergic rhinitis ) grass pollen > 1 year positive SPT > 3mm wheal diameter grass pollen . Age 2065 year adult Body Mass Index 19 29 ( people normal overweight range ) Having obtain his/her informed consent . Anemia Family history congenital immunodeficiency Regular consumption immunosuppressive antiinflammatory treatment Under medication allergy ( e.g . anti histaminic ) Avoid regular consumption probiotic dietary nutritional intervention Have high alcohol consumption ( 1 drink/day ) Consumption illicit drug Pregnancy Subject expect comply study procedure , include consume test product Currently participate participate another clinical trial last 4 week prior begin study
